channel.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
channel.description:
##Welcome
**Timer** https://countingdownto.com/
**Rules**
1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244) 2. Don't be a dick 3. Don't be inactive 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 5. Don't throw the game (from Rule #1)
**Gameplay** Days will be 5 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Black Rose/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in my [Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249)
When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
**Executions** To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by messaging me After the votes are revealed, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day Trials pause the counter
**After The Night** You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed **Day:** You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened
**Journals** Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
**To Join** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
**Rolelist:** 16 players
**Special Mechanics:** Every single player will die of starvation on Night 3 There is only one way to stop this, obtain bread 1 bread will keep you alive for 2 nights The Spiritualist and Revenant classes will not be used, but all other unofficial classes *will* be used There will be at least 1 Baker present at the start of the game
**New Classes:** >#[color=steblue]The Baker[/color] **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **Sworn Duty(Passive)** - You cannot become King **Day Baking(Day)** - Give 1 player a loaf of bread - 1 day cooldown **Bake(Night)** - Choose 2 players, each receives 1 loaf of bread - Infinite Uses *Your objective is to Eliminate the Unseen, The Cult, and any Neutrals who stand against you*
---------- >#[color=purple]The Chef[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cook[/color] **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Support[/color]** **Sworn Duty(Passive)** - You cannot become King **No time to waste(Passive)** - You do not meet with your faction or know their identities, but do not count towards the convert limit **Bake(Night)** - Choose 2 players, each receives 1 loaf of bread - Infinite Uses *Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you*
---------- >#[color=dasbrown]The Thief[/color] **[color=grey]Neutral Wildcard[/color]** **Always Away(Passive)** - You are immune to death at night **Thievin' Mitts(Night)** - Occupy a player, taking 1 loaf of bread from them, if possible, if you are successful you cannot use this ability the next night - Infinite Uses *Your objective is to remain alive until the game ends*
Players: 1. Hippolytus - Dead 2. PurpleyPete - Dead 3. Rogue - Dead 4. Damafaud - Alive 5. PokemonKidRyan - Dead 6. FadeBlade - Dead 7. Queen_Alfa - Dead 8. Insanity - Dead 9. Icibalus - Dead 10. NozBugz - Dead 11. Frostwolf103 - Dead 12. PolikShadowbliss - King - Dead 13. Ingeel - Dead 14. SadSnake - Alive 15. Unknown - Dead 16. ThePlex - Dead
Graveyard: 13. Ingeel - **[color=green]Alchemist[/color]** - **Killed Night 1** 10. Nozbugz - **[color=steblue]Butler[/color]** - **Executed Day 2** 5. PokemonKidRyan - **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]** - **Killed Night 2** 11. Frostwolf103 - **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]** - **Executed Day 3** 12. PolikShadowbliss - **[color=red]The Psy[/color][color=orange]chopat[/color][color=yellow]hic Kin[/color][color=green]g[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 15. Unknown - **[color=steblue]Sheriff[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 1. Hippolytus - **[color=steblue]Maid[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 3. Rogue - **[color=steblue]Squire[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 7. Queen_Alfa - **[color=steblue]Court Wizard[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 8. Insanity - **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 6. FadeBlade - **[color=steblue]Court Wizard[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 16. ThePlex - **[color=olive]Mercenary[/color]** - **Killed Night 3** 2. PurpleyPete - **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** - **Executed Day 4** 9. Icibalus - **[color=orange]Demon[/color]** - **Executed Day 5**
Timeline: [Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol5-famine-day-1/1867/263?u=jammysplodge) [Night 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol5-famine-day-1/1867/289?u=jammysplodge) [Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol5-famine-day-1/1867/297?u=jammysplodge) [Night 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol5-famine-day-2/1867/1046?u=jammysplodge) [Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol5-famine-day-2/1867/1050?u=jammysplodge) [Night 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol5-famine-day-3/1867/1591?u=jammysplodge) [Day 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol5-famine-day-3/1867/1593?u=jammysplodge)

item.description:
and the fact that i fed 2 scums N1, and the fact that CWs didn’t do their jobs…

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Well the real reason we lost is that Pete has the brain capacity of a Melon and decided to kill PKR after literally everyone told him multiple times not to.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Yeah and Fade didn’t even look for any night plans, otherwise Fade would have realized that he was needed on Sad Snake. This loss is not only on Fade, but Fade’s gameplay behaviour was poor, the Butler’s gameplay behaviour was also not good, while the rest at least tried within their abilities; even Icibalus who made a blunder, but not one rooted in lazyness to read the chat or in behaviour caused by bad reasons( not liking execution of neutral claims), but simply forgetfulness in the rush of the moment.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
NozBugz would have likely followed the plan, which I intend to depose him - remember I was the one who started the lynch.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Yeah but that one had a defense that was so bad that you wouldn’t have needed any Unseen to execute.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I mean you still would have lost if Fade had bothered to read the thread. We had 2 Court Wiazards which was ample roleblockers - an extra Butler would not have helped our plans if noone follows them anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Unknown:

Yeah but there were alot of Occupying BD

Precisely, people realizes I am threat on Day 3 that allow to make lynch wagon on unsuspecting roleblocker that put poor defense.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Yeah but there were alot of Occupying BD… the problem was that the one assigned to Sad Snake did not do his job because he was too lazy to search for the night plan. Not because he distrusted the plan, no…
If it would have been a fakeclaim, all right… but that is as bad as the blunder of Icibalus not knowing that MM is night immune.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Because the baker not being affected by convert will able to vote with PurpleyPete to Damafaud rather than vice versa if it wasn’t for NozBugz still alive on Day 3 otherwise.

I know who’s the danger for Unseen and I manage the majority to vote NozBugz and lynched, I am more cunning than you have realized. @Unknown

Just a single Butler / Thief could have ruined Unseen’s chances to win and Queen_Alfa’s inability would have also costed us. I mean if she actually did roleblock SadSnake and if NozBugz was alive at Day 3 - then he would have go for Damafaud, simple as that. Conversion too impossible.

Read full topic

Bad luck.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
My recent comment, Icibalus - if the prince act fast enough to jail you on day - then you’re screwed either way.

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
You do realise I would have won if I knew Mastermind was night immune?

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Because if he was alive before hunger takes him, NozBugz would able to roleblock Damafaud when he becomes Mastermind after I died, leaving no stone unturned for the BD and of course, they will be completely caught by surprise of the Demon and the Demon would have won unless he’s jailed.

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL5: Famine [Unseen Win]
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
The other reason we won is that we eliminated a possible active roleblocker which is NozBugz - so my intention to lynch NozBugs wasn’t exactly to lynch the thief claim and if it did, that worked just about the same.

Read full topic
